GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19.8 to before v5.19.12
GSD.description:
mm/slab_common: fix possible double free of kmem_cache

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.12 by commit c673c6ceac53fb2e631c9fbbd79957099a08927f, it was introduced in version v5.19.8 by commit 357321557920c805de2b14832002465c320eea4f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mm/slab_common: fix possible double free of kmem_cache
